text: Enkal iraivane! Enkal iruvaraiyum unnai murrilum valipatum muslimkalakkuvayaka, enkal cantatiyinaritamiruntum unnai murrilum valipatum oru kuttattinarai (muslim camutayattai)akki vaippayaka, nankal unnai valipatum valikalaiyum arivittarulvayaka, enkalai(k karunaiyutan nokki enkal pilaikalai) mannippayaka, niccayamaka niye mikka mannipponum, alavila anputaiyonakavum irukkinray
